TopicTitle: KSP 1.3.0.1804 Kerbal Alarm Clock 3.8.4.0 Spamming the Log File

Articles.Content:
Just putting my favorite mods back into KSP 1.3 and having the following issue:

Steam KSP 64bit 1.3.0.1804 clean install (meaning that I deleted everything within the the KSP folder and had steam replace all the files)

Added only Kerbal Alarm Clock after the clean install.

Tested In following saves New Sandbox, New Science, New Career, Career started in 1.2.0

Kerbal Alarm Clock seems to be working for functionality however the log is getting spammed with the following

"Exception: Missing Field Exception: Field '.KeyBinding.primary" not found"

 

Spamming appears to happen in all situations except when in the Title Screen.

 

TriggerAu I know you are a busy man, and its a free mod so no pressure at all, just giving you the heads up.
This is no longer a problem after the last update for KAC. Thanks for supporting this little gem
